row.process:
:set &DATES# = create_process("NEW") :SET &NOW# = SYS_TIMESTAMP_PHYSICAL(&$TIMEZONE#) :SET &DATE# = SYS_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY",&$TIMEZONE#) :SET &ret# = put_process_line(&DATES#,"PLMI;TS;MM/DD/YYYY;DD-MON-YYYY;MM-DD-YYYY;YYYY-MM-DD",";") :SET &C# = 0 :WHILE &C# <= 90 : SET &C# = FORMAT(&C#) : IF &C# <> 0 : SET &PL_TS# = ADD_TIMESTAMP(&PL_TS#,"24:00:00") : SET &MI_TS# = SUB_TIMESTAMP(&MI_TS#,"24:00:00") : SET &PL_DATE# = ADD_DAYS("MM/DD/YYYY:&DATE#",&C#) : SET &MI_DATE# = SUB_DAYS("MM/DD/YYYY:&DATE#",&C#) : SET &PL_MON# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&PL_DATE#","DD-MON-YYYY") : SET &MI_MON# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&MI_DATE#","DD-MON-YYYY") : SET &PL_MMDDYYYY# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&PL_DATE#","MM-DD-YYYY") : SET &MI_MMDDYYYY# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&MI_DATE#","MM-DD-YYYY") : SET &PL_YYYYMMDD# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&PL_DATE#","YYYY-MM-DD") : SET &MI_YYYYMMDD# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&MI_DATE#","YYYY-MM-DD") : SET &ret# = put_process_line(&DATES#,"+&C#;&PL_TS#;&PL_DATE#;&PL_MON#;&PL_MMDDYYYY#;&PL_YYYYMMDD#",";") : SET &ret# = put_process_line(&DATES#,"-&C#;&MI_TS#;&MI_DATE#;&MI_MON#;&MI_MMDDYYYY#;&mi_YYYYMMDD#",";") : ELSE : SET &PL_TS# = &NOW# : SET &MI_TS# = &NOW# : SET &PL_DATE# = &DATE# : SET &MI_DATE# = &DATE# : SET &MON# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&DATE#","DD-MON-YYYY") : SET &MMDDYYYY# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&DATE#","MM-DD-YYYY") : SET &YYYYMMDD# = CONV_DATE("MM/DD/YYYY:&DATE#","YYYY-MM-DD") : SET &ret# = put_process_line(&DATES#,"&C#;&NOW#;&DATE#;&MON#;&MMDDYYYY#;&YYYYMMDD#",";") : ENDIF : SET &C# = &C# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:pset &RESULT# = save_process(&DATES#) :close_process &DATES#
